zh-cn: 娜杰日达·谢尔盖耶芙娜·阿利卢耶娃

description.zh-cn: 苏联最高领导人约瑟夫·斯大林的第二任妻子。
description.en: The second wife of Soviet leader Joseph Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林与娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃的儿子。
description.en: Son of Joseph Stalin and Nadezhda Alliluyeva.

nodes.id: 斯韦特兰娜·阿利卢耶娃

zh-cn: 斯韦特兰娜·阿利卢耶娃

description.zh-cn: 斯大林与娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃的女儿。
description.en: Daughter of Joseph Stalin and Nadezhda Alliluyeva.

description.zh-cn: 娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃的父亲，一位在高加索工作的铁路工人。
description.en: Father of Nadezhda Alliluyeva, a railway worker in the Caucasus.

description.zh-cn: 娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃的母亲，拥有德国和格鲁吉亚血统。
description.en: Mother of Nadezhda Alliluyeva, of German and Georgian descent.

description.zh-cn: 苏联的建立者，娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃曾担任其办公室机要秘书。
description.en: Founder of the Soviet Union, for whom Nadezhda Alliluyeva worked as a confidential secretary in his office.

description.zh-cn: 莫洛托夫的妻子，娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃的密友。
description.en: Wife of Molotov and a close friend of Nadezhda Alliluyeva.

description.zh-cn: 苏联政治家，其妻子是娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃的密友。
description.en: Soviet politician whose wife was a close friend of Nadezhda Alliluyeva.

nodes.id: 列夫·格里戈里耶维奇·莱温

zh-cn: 列夫·格里戈里耶维奇·莱温

description.zh-cn: 克里姆林宫医生，因拒绝在娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃的验尸报告上签字而在第二次莫斯科审判中被处决。
description.en: A Kremlin doctor who was executed during the Second Moscow Trial for refusing to sign Nadezhda Alliluyeva's autopsy report.

nodes.id: 德里米里·普列特尼奥夫

zh-cn: 德里米里·普列特尼奥夫

description.zh-cn: 克里姆林宫医生，因拒绝在娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃的验尸报告上签字而在第二次莫斯科审判中被处决。
description.en: A Kremlin doctor who was executed during the Second Moscow Trial for refusing to sign Nadezhda Alliluyeva's autopsy report.

description.zh-cn: 娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃是斯大林的第二任妻子。
description.en: Nadezhda Alliluyeva was the second wife of Stalin.

description.zh-cn: 根据娜杰日达的密友波林娜·热姆丘任娜的说法，两人的婚姻并不愉快，斯大林和娜杰日达之间经常发生争吵。
description.en: According to Nadezhda's close friend Polina Zhemchuzhina, their marriage was unhappy, and Stalin and Nadezhda frequently quarreled.

relationships.source: 斯韦特兰娜·阿利卢耶娃
斯韦特兰娜·阿利卢耶娃

description.zh-cn: 1911年，斯大林从流放地西伯利亚逃出后，谢尔盖·阿利卢耶夫一家为斯大林提供了庇护。
description.en: In 1911, after Stalin escaped from his exile in Siberia, the Alliluyev family provided him with shelter.

description.zh-cn: 斯大林曾在娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃溺水时将其救起，她从此爱上了斯大林。
description.en: Stalin once saved Nadezhda Alliluyeva from drowning, and she fell in love with him thereafter.

description.zh-cn: 十月革命之后，娜杰日达成为列宁办公室的机要秘书。
description.en: After the October Revolution, Nadezhda became a confidential secretary in Lenin's office.

description.zh-cn: 根据文本，波林娜·热姆丘任娜是娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃的密友。
description.en: According to the text, Polina Zhemchuzhina was a close friend of Nadezhda Alliluyeva.

relationships.target: 列夫·格里戈里耶维奇·莱温

description.zh-cn: 因拒绝在娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃的验尸报告上签字，列夫·列文在第二次莫斯科审判中被处决。
description.en: For refusing to sign Nadezhda Alliluyeva's autopsy report, Lev Levin was executed during the Second Moscow Trial.

relationships.target: 德里米里·普列特尼奥夫

description.zh-cn: 因拒绝在娜杰日达·阿利卢耶娃的验尸报告上签字，德里米里·普列特尼奥夫在第二次莫斯科审判中被处决。
description.en: For refusing to sign Nadezhda Alliluyeva's autopsy report, Dmitry Pletnev was executed during the Second Moscow Trial.
